alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 3:55PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Accumulating Snow Chance Tonight into Monday... There`s a chance for a little accumulating snowfall across our northern reaches too, tonight into Monday. Snow will begin this evening and then spread and expand over the area through tomorrow. Forecast amounts range from a dusting of a few tenths of an inch north, closer to the I-64/I-57 junction in southern Illinois, up to around an inch further south, down close to Route 13 in southern Illinois and the Ohio River in southwest Indiana and far northwest Kentucky. Keep in mind a Winter Weather Advisory is in effect south of Route 13 in southern Illinois, over much of southeast Missouri and western Kentucky, where 1 to 3 inch amounts are possible. Even just a little bit of a shift in the system could provide slightly higher or lower amounts accordingly.
